title: Ticket #7312: Improve JobRouter JobPeriodicExpression evaluation failure message
description:
At the University of Puerto Rico, we're seeing an issue with EvalAllSrcJobPeriodicExprs() (https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/blob/master/src/condor_job_router/JobRouter.cpp#L605-L614}) that results in the following error messages: 

10/09/19 01:54:28 JobRouter failure (src=32888.0,dest=29356.0): Unable to evaluate job's periodic policy expressions.
10/09/19 01:54:28 JobRouter failure (src=32888.0,dest=29356.0): failed to reset src job attributes, because ad not found in collection.

The first message should be improved so that it tells us what kind of job periodic policy failed to evaluate and why.
creator: blin
